bf.dropdown.text.party.invite.tip: 邀請此玩家加入你的隊伍
bf.gamemode.boot.description: 通過官方培訓課程學習遊戲的基礎知識！
bf.gamemode.dom.description: 與你的團隊盡力占領地圖中的控制點來取得勝利。得分最高的團隊獲勝！
bf.gamemode.rr.description: 我們之中有一個間諜！作為軍官，避開間諜。作為蓋世太保，找到並殺死間諜！作為間諜，殺死軍官！
bf.gamemode.tdm.description: 在有限的時間和最高分數的情況下，你必須在被殺之前殺死其他團隊的所有玩家！
bf.gamemode.ffa.description: 在有限的時間和最高分數的情況下，您必須殺死匹配賽中的所有其他玩家才能獲勝！
bf.gamemode.inf.description: 你和你的戰友們必須戰勝永無止境的不死族浪潮！
bf.gamemode.gg.description: 每次擊殺後升級你的武器。頻繁的死亡會減少你的計數，第一個達到最高等級武器的玩家獲勝！
bf.item.gun.name: %s's %s
bf.rankup.title: 你的等級提升了！

bf.message.gamemode.class.assault.desc: Effective in close-quarters combat, equipped with effective close-range weaponry
bf.message.gamemode.class.commander.desc: Leads their troops into battle. Equipped with command radio and equipment to call in air strikes and support
bf.message.gamemode.class.light.rifleman: Similar traits to rifleman class, commonly equipped with semi-automatic firearms
bf.message.gamemode.class.machine.gunner: Effective for mid-range suppressive fire to help fellow soldiers advance
bf.message.gamemode.class.rifleman.desc: Effective in mid-range combat and harsh battle endurance
bf.message.gamemode.class.rocket.desc: Effective in mid-range to long-range combat, commonly equipped with explosives and rocket-propelling weaponry
bf.message.gamemode.class.sniper.desc: Effective in long-range combat, giving support to fellow soldiers, or calling out enemy advancements
bf.message.gamemode.class.specialist.des: Effective in mid-range combat. Commonly uses a combination of flanking and tactical advancements
bf.message.gamemode.class.support.desc: Effective for mobility whilst maintaining high-powered support fire for fellow soldiers
bf.message.gamemode.class.medic.desc: Provides efficient and mobile medical support for all other troops in the battlefield
